Name: Arcane Insight
Story Background: As the mage delved into ancient tomes, a surge of arcane knowledge flooded their mind, unraveling the intricacies of spells and revealing hidden truths.
Ability: Draw two cards, then discard a card unless you discard an instant or sorcery card.
Appearance Description: A mystic figure surrounded by floating scrolls and crackling energy, their mind illuminated with the swirling patterns of arcane knowledge. The artwork is adorned with shimmering blues and deep indigos, evoking the enigmatic allure of arcane insight.
